Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Beverly Park Hotel in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Las Burras Beach and Playa de San Agustin. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Kasbah Shopping Center and Yumbo Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 469 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and a hair salon.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Beverly Park Hotel. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Beverly Park Hotel. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary breakfast is included.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Burras Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 2 km / 1.3 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
El Aguila Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Meloneras Beach - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Palmitos Park - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi

The preferred airport for Beverly Park Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 25.3 km / 15.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
